Posts.Content: Nov 13, 2015 12:23PM Nightmareshope wrote: good morning everyone. I'm new to the boards. I have had two surgeries. And am waiting on a genetic test to see if I'm high risk for cancer elsewhere in my body. Then thinking of radiation, which I have fought against since the get go. Interesting information. I don't want to be burned or tired 6 months after radiation.
